item.title: What is Blockchain and how does Bitcoin work
item.description: Blockchain is great technology, it promises to disturb and change a number of industries that is not limited to the technology scene.

item.title: Autonomous Vehicles: The Next Disruptive Technology
item.description: The ultimate goal of the tech industry is to eliminate routine, turning the human attention away from repetitive tasks, to focus on creative ones.

item.title: Representing numbers in computers
item.description: One of the basic laws on which computers were designed and built over time is abstraction. under the hood all we can see and interact with on computers is just a bunch of electronic signals stored and manipulated in magnetic or electric form.

item.title: Clean Code: A Necessity for Business Success
item.description: Writing a program is not very different from writing a novel. a program has to have a beginning and an end, it must be structured in a logical way, it must adhere to a set of strict conventions, and it has to have some imagination in dealing with the problem at hand.
